original_title: Vaya Con Dios - the ultimate collection DVD
overview: Live acoustic concert on the DVD was recorded in Brussels - Summer 2006 in 5.1 Dolby Surround Sound.  Video format is PAL, region 2. Approx live duration: 45 minutes.  DVD contains bonus interview with subtitles and a picture slideshow.
title: Vaya Con Dios - the ultimate collection DVD
